issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
I am build the application from this titanium sdk (3.0.3 , 3.1.3, 3.1.1 , 3.2.0(master build) which downloaded from continues build.

but the behavior of application not remains constant.

-----------------
TEST CASE - > 

in 3.1.1 application works fine which is right now I am using.

but if when I change the titanium sdk 3.1.1 to 3.2.0 and then build the application. it put bad affect one application like button and it's image not displayed

and when I use 3.1.3 and build the application >
and open the installed application first it shows me splace screen after It displaying the white screen 1 to 2 sec. and then start the app.


this is my setting in tiapp.xml config
 
------------------------------

<android xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android">
<tool-api-level>17</tool-api-level>

 <uses-sdk android:minSdkVersion="1" android:targetSdkVersion="8"/>

<application android:hardwareAccelerated="true" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.NoTitleBar"/>
</android>



------------------------

is it any uninstalling proccess and then installing the new Titanium sdk?
fields.summary: Application remains not constant when i used defferent- defferent  mobile sdk version

comments.body: Since this is an evolving product, the API is no backward compatible and the API will be different for each newer version.
so do you mean if i build the project in 3.1.1 and if new version is launched suppose 3.1.2 then it's not compatible ? right...!!
True in most of the cases, yes.
